tika-s0403t5:2_3: Ettha ca āvarantīti kusaladhammuppattiṁ ādito parivārenti.
tika-s0403t5:2_6: Nīvaraṇavasenāti niravasesato vāraṇavasenāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0403t5:2_7: Yasmā pañca nīvaraṇā uppajjamānā anuppannāya lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya uppajjituṁ na denti,
tika-s0403t5:2_8: uppannāpi aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca vā abhiññā upacchinditvā pātenti,
tika-s0403t5:2_10: Upacchindanaṁ pātanañcettha tāsaṁ paññānaṁ anuppannānaṁ uppajjituṁ appadānameva.
tika-s0403t5:2_11: Iti mahaggatānuttarapaññānaṁ ekaccāya ca parittapaññāya anuppattihetubhūtā nīvaraṇadhammā itarāsaṁ samatthataṁ
tika-s0403t5:2_13: Bhāvanāmanasikārena vinā pakatiyā manussehi nibbattetabbo dhammoti manussadhammo,
tika-s0403t5:2_22: alamariyo ca so ñāṇadassanaviseso cāti alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso.
tika-s0403t5:3_0: Ñāṇadassananti ca dibbacakkhupi vipassanāpi maggopi phalampi paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi sabbaññutaññāṇampi vuccati.
tika-s0403t5:3_1: “Appamatto samāno ñāṇadassanaṁ ārādhetī”ti hi ettha dibbacakkhu ñāṇadassanaṁ nāma.
tika-s0403t5:3_3: “Abhabbā te ñāṇāya dassanāya anuttarāya sambodhāyā”ti ettha maggo.
tika-s0403t5:3_4: “Ayamañño uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāro”ti ettha phalaṁ.
tika-s0403t5:3_9: “Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṁ udapādi ‘sattāhakālakato āḷāro kālāmo”’ti ettha sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ.
tika-s0403t5:3_11: Ettha ca rūpāyatanaṁ jānāti cakkhuviññāṇaṁ viya passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṁ,
tika-s0403t5:3_13: Sammasanūpacāre ca dhammalakkhaṇattayañca tathā jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṁ,
tika-s0403t5:3_15: Nibbānaṁ cattāri vā saccāni asammohappaṭivedhato jānāti passati cāti ñāṇadassanaṁ, maggo.
tika-s0403t5:3_17: Paccavekkhaṇā maggādhigatassa atthassa sabbaso jotanaṭṭhena ñāṇadassanaṁ.
tika-s0403t5:6_6: “Abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya āgatattā”ti vuttattā paccekabodhisattasāvakabodhisattānampi paṇidhānato pabhuti āgatasaddhā āgamanasaddā eva,
tika-s0403t5:6_8: Adhigamato samudāgatattā aggamaggaphalasampayuttā cāpi adhigamasaddhā nāma,
tika-s0403t5:6_14: Yathā tena paṭividdhena sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ hatthagataṁ ahosi,
tika-s0403t5:6_17: tassa dhammasudhammatāya saṅghasuppaṭipannatāya tena paṭivedhena saddhā na tathāti aṭṭhānametaṁ anavakāso.
tika-s0403t5:6_20: buddhe pasanno dhamme pasanno saṅghe pasanno”tiādi.
tika-s0403t5:6_21: Padhānavīriyaṁ ijjhati “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇato muccissāmī”ti sakkaccaṁ padahanato.
tika-s0403t5:7_3: Daḷhaṁ katvā pacantī hi gahaṇī ghorabhāvena pittavikārādivasena rogaṁ janeti,
tika-s0403t5:7_4: sithilaṁ katvā pacantī mandabhāvena vātavikārādivasena tenāha “nātisītāya nāccuṇhāyā”ti.
tika-s0403t5:7_5: Gahaṇitejassa mandapaṭutāvasena sattānaṁ yathākkamaṁ sītuṇhasahatāti āha “atisītalaggahaṇiko”tiādi.
tika-s0403t5:7_6: Yāthāvato accayadesanā attano āvikaraṇaṁ nāmāti āha “yathābhūtaṁ attano aguṇaṁ pakāsetā”ti.
tika-s0403t5:7_7: Udayatthagāminiyāti saṅkhārānaṁ udayañca vayañca paṭivijjhantiyāti ayamettha atthoti āha “udayañcā”tiādi.
tika-s0403t5:7_9: Nibbijjhituṁ samatthāyāti tadaṅgavasena savisesaṁ pajahituṁ samatthāya.
tika-s0403t5:7_10: Tassa dukkhassa khayagāminiyāti yaṁ dukkhaṁ imasmiṁ ñāṇe anadhigate pavattirahaṁ,
tika-s0403t5:14_5: Tenāha “catasso disā ca anudisā ca mayhaṁ na upaṭṭhahantī”ti.
tika-s0403t5:17_1: Sattame jarādhammoti dhamma-saddo “asammosadhammo nibbāna”ntiādīsu viya pakatipariyāyo,
tika-s0403t5:17_7: Taṁ pana dāyajjaṁ kāraṇūpacārena vadanto “kammaṁ mayhaṁ dāyajjaṁ santakanti attho”ti āha yathā “kusalānaṁ,
tika-s0403t5:17_11: Yonīhi phalaṁ sabhāvato bhinnampi abhinnaṁ viya missitaṁ hoti.
tika-s0403t5:17_15: kammaṁ pana ekantasambandhavāti āha “kammaṁ mayhaṁ bandhū”ti.
tika-s0403t5:18_2: “Ahaṁ nirogo saṭṭhi vā sattati vā vassāni atikkantāni,
tika-s0403t5:18_6: ko añño mayā sadiso nirogo nāmā”ti evaṁ mānakaraṇaṁ ārogyamado.
tika-s0403t5:18_8: tadubhayaṁ anoloketvā pabandhaṭṭhitiṁ paccayasulabhatañca nissāya “ciraṁ jīviṁ,
tika-s0403t5:19_6: Kāmāpi “yaṁ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ,
tika-s0403t5:19_7: ayaṁ kāmānaṁ assādo”ti evaṁ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato “upadhiyati ettha sukha”nti iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0403t5:22_1: Aṭṭhame sāpateyyanti ettha saṁ vuccati dhanaṁ,
tika-s0403t5:23_0: Anvāya upanissāya jīvanasīlā anujīvinoti āha “ye ca etaṁ upanissāya jīvantī”ti.
tika-s0403t5:23_1: Ekaṁ mahākulaṁ nissāya paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi kulāni jīvanti,
